mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TREVIEW (TREVID, TRIPID, MEMID, TREVSTATUS, TREVTITLE, TREVCOURSE, TREVCONTENT, TREVIMGPATH, TREVRATING, TREVREGDATE, TREVUPDATE, TREVCOUNT) VALUES (seq_trevid.nextval, #{tripid}, #{memid}, #{trevstatus}, #{trevtitle}, #{trevcourse}, #{trevcontent}, #{trevimgpath}, #{trevrating}, #{trevregdate}, #{trevupdate}, #{trevcount})
